If you're a coder, you can generate your own list like this using the tool [https://github.com/upsided/DescribedInstanceList DescribedInstanceList at GitHub].

This is a spidered list of the top 100 instances with descriptions. They are ranked by the performance score given at https://instances.mastodon.xyz/list. This list is probably not recent. These instances may not allow open registration, may not have a lot of users, and *may contain offensive content*.

====Description====

This is Sandwich's public Mastodon instance. Welcome! Moderation is at our discretion - please see below.

We recommend that you read the #MastodonSandwich hashtag and @sungo's toot about Mastodon's risks. Feel free to chat with us about risk, privacy, security, and other questions.

We support free and controversial speech, but also wish to maintain a pleasant environment. We forbid trolling, harassment, bigotry, and spam. Please use the Content Warning feature for NSFW or traumatic topics. When handling problems, we try to consider all of the circumstances, and to be reasonable and understanding.

We will not sell your data, and will make every reasonable attempt to combat coerced disclosure of your data or our logs.

===[https://mastodon.host/about/more mastodon.host]===

====[http://www.unmung.com/mastoview?url=mastodon.host&view=local (Preview This Instance)]====

====Description====

General, fast, stable and open instance.

Federate with everyone.

One of the most complete Federated timeline thanks to @federationbot

lightly moderated in general, common sense applied. That said, read the rules below :)

 What sets mastodon.host appart ?

As a general instance, we are not centered on a specific theme, or a specific language. Everyone is welcome as long as they follow the few rules we have.

We have a very good view of the federation ( our federated timeline gives you a more broad view of the Mastodon network than a 'normal' instance, there's a lot to read in a lot of languages ).

Although we are a medium+ sized instance, we'd like to keep the feeling that you are at home and safe here.

Never hesitate to contact the admin team if you have any questions !

Please read the FAQ below or at https://mastodon.host/about/more to get started.

What are the instance rules ?

No illegal stuff, harassment, discrimination, xenophobia, threats or any behavior that is not appropriate to a friend will be tolerated to our users. This is a safe place for everyone, respect your fellow users or silence/block if you don't want to see someone. We moderate on our users report

Erotic/Porn/Gore/Etc..  talks/pictures/videos.. must be  behind a CW. If you would not open that picture/video in front of your boss/wife/husband/kids => CW ( Content Warning ).

Anything that is illegal in Europe/USA shall not be posted on this server, Lolicons for example are illegal.

Globally common sense applied,

 don't do illegal stuff, don't discriminate, don't be a racist, etc...

Notify to an administrator or report if you have a doubt. Do not engage, if you don't want to see someone's contributions, you can block/silence that person and report to us, we'll deal with it.We try to post in english so everyone understands, but that rule is not enforced at all ;)

Most important have fun and be nice to each other !

Oh and nazis, racists  are banned on sight too, of course.

What is this instance privacy policy ?

We will never share your data with anyone, except if a valid legal request is received (Hopefully it will not happen).

Who are the admins ? Shoutouts section.

This instance is hosted by @gled

====Contact====

Admin: @gled@mastodon.host

Email: [mailto:gled@remote-shell.net gled@remote-shell.net]

====[http://www.unmung.com/mastoview?url=mastodon.org.uk&view=local (Preview This Instance)]====

====Description====

Statistics

How does it work? When you create an account on Mastodon, you create an account on the website you currently are visiting. For example, here you are on mastodon.org.uk. That is your instance.

You will notice after log in two different timelines, the Local and the Federated.

The local timeline is all the public toots of all our local users ( the one who registered on mastodon.org.uk and use it to access the Mastodon federation ).

The federated timeline adds the public toots of all the users that our local users are following in other servers/

Need to know users 

@xvilo Is the maintainer of this instance.

@STATUS Gives you information about this instance.

@userscount Gives us detailed info about users and toots.

Bots on this instance 

@STATUS Gives us an automated heads up when there is a new Mastodon Version available.

@userscount Gives us detailed info about users and toots. Source on Github

@bigben Toots the time. Source on Github. Maintained by @followthesam

	Bots are welcome here but please not that bots will be silenced when posting too much (e.g. flooding local timeline). If you have a bot, please contact me (@xvilo). I can add it to the list. 

	Bots will be banned if they post inappropriate content or if I (@xvilo) get many complaints about it. 

====Contact====

Admin: @xvilo@mastodon.org.uk

Email: [mailto:sem@tropical.email sem@tropical.email]

====Description====

s.meo.ws is an experimental Mastodon cluster managed by FuslVZ.

Policies:

Any content/site/service/action illegal in Austria, England, Ukraine or United States

DMCA takedown requests are checked and content is removed if we think it violates the policies

Spamming and mass user following is strictly forbidden and will result in removal of your account

Pornographic content is allowed - Pornographic content picturing minors (under 18) is obviously not allowed, this includes soft pornography and nudity as well

SLA, uptime, service info and support:

We run the systems based on a best-effort policy. We do not offer SLA or uptime guarantee.

Although we try our best, we can not guarantee that this service can be provided forever.

Support (if any at all) is also based on a best-effort policy - Please contact @fusl@s.meo.ws if you have any questions or support inquiries.

This basically means that no SLA is included so if you would like to sign up, do it at your own risk.

===[https://md.ggtea.org/about/more md.ggtea.org]===

====[http://www.unmung.com/mastoview?url=md.ggtea.org&view=local (Preview This Instance)]====

====Description====

ggtea.orgの人のほぼ個人用インスタンスです

サービスの継続性その他は管理人が管理出来る範囲で処理されます

禁止事項など

警察や、裁判所からの手紙、内容証明郵便が来るような行為

管理人の許可しないBotの運用

自動化された大量フォロー、大量ポストなどのサーバに負荷がかかる行為

注意事項など

基本的に人の活動に対応するアカウントを想定しています。

宣伝ほかについては迷惑になりそうな場合何らかの対処をする可能性はあります。

無人っぽいアカウントも消す可能性があります。

サーバのメンテナンスについては随時行なう可能性があります。できるだけ起こらないようにしますがメンテナンスの結果データが消える可能性は当然あります。

負荷増大の結果家鯖で処理出来無くなった場合サービスを止めるなどをする可能性はあります。

家鯖の回線の不調、家鯖の不調、家鯖の構成変更ほかによりサービスの可用性に問題が発生する可能性があります。

サーバ内の比較的古い過去の画像などのデータに関しては消していく可能性が高いです。

その他想定外の事象に対しては常識的に考えられる方向にベストエフォートで対応されます。

====Description====

Une instance ouverte à tou.te.s, qui se veut un minimum inclusive :

serveur réservé aux personnes parlant français ou anglais, par souci de facilité de modération.

Sexisme, racisme, homophobie et toutes formes d'exclusion des minorités sont à proscrire pour le bien être de tou.te.s.

Respectez la vie privée des personnes.

Utilisez les tags et autres CW que vous jugez adaptés, en particulier pour le contenu NotSafeForWork (NSFW).

Essayez d'être prévénant.e.s et inclusif.ve.s.

Si l'un de vos propos est perçu comme excluant et que quelqu'un vous en informe, écoutez. Nous sortirons tou.te.s grandi.e.s d'un tel dialogue.

Sachez que nous préférerons toujours notre liberté d'être ensemble à votre liberté d'exclure.

J'ai décidé de ne pas modérer l'extérieur de l'instance (bloquer des instances et/ou utilisatrices/eurs d'autres instances), sauf exceptions qui seront signalées ici et annoncées publiquements si des cas graves se présentent. J'estime qu'il est à chacun.e de choisir ce qu'iel veut lire de l'extérieur.

Merci au POOP, dont je ne cesse de m'inspirer de leur code de conduite.

(In the spirit of tilde.club...)

English: Mammouth Café is a Swiss Mastodon instance running on a French server and open to the world. We particularly welcome artists and illustrators, journalists and writers, librarians and archivists, scientists and engineers, teachers, as well as all curious minds.

Registrations will be limited to 640 users (‘640 users ought to be enough for anybody.’ — Bill Gates).

Français: Mammouth Café est une instance suisse de Mastodon tournant sur un serveur français et ouverte au monde. Nous accueillons particulièrement volontiers les artistes, les illustratrices et illustrateurs, les journalistes, les auteures et auteurs, les bibliothécaires et les archivistes, les scientifiques, les ingénieures et les ingénieurs, les enseignantes et enseignants, ainsi que tous les esprits curieux.

Les inscriptions à cette instance seront limitées à 640 utilisateurs («640 utilisateurs devraient suffire à quiconque.» — Bill Gates). 

Italiano: Mammouth Café è un'istanza svizzera di Mastodon installata su un server francese e aperta al mondo. Particolarmente benvenute e benvenuti sono artiste e artisti, illustratrici e illustratori, giornaliste e giornalisti, autori, bibliotecarie e bibliotecari, archivisti, scienziate e scienziati, ingegnere e ingegneri, insegnanti, così come tutte le menti curiose.

Le iscrizioni su questa istanza saranno limitate a 640 utenti (“640 utenti dovrebbero bastare a chiunque.” — Bill Gates).

With ❤ from Atelier Mammouth.

====[http://www.unmung.com/mastoview?url=lgbt.io&view=local (Preview This Instance)]====

====Description====

By signing up, you agree to abide by the Terms and the Rules for this instance as follows:-

Do not discriminate, harrass and/or insult members based on their religion, race, sex, political beliefs, or whether they are gay or straight.

Do not bully and/or pick on other members.

Do not flame other members.

Do not advertise. As of now, you are not permitted to make money using lgbt.io.

Do not publicly expose your real identity unless you're using "Direct" privacy and you're communicating with someone you can trust.

Do not post screenshots or history of toot conversations publicly without all participants' consent.

Do not post copyrighted, piracy, warez and leaked content.

Do not spam.

All NSFW/sexual content must be accompanied by NSFW (not safe for work) and/or CW (content warning) option when writing a toot.

..more rules will be added when needed.

Note: Make sure to report any toots that violate the rules. A staff member will evaluate the reported toots and take appropriate actions against the them.

Happy tooting! :)

====Contact====

Admin: @self@lgbt.io

Email: [mailto:admin@lgbt.io admin@lgbt.io]

====[http://www.unmung.com/mastoview?url=mastodon.elmit.com&view=local (Preview This Instance)]====

====Description====

The Twitter Killer

Welcome

Here some resources to understand Mastodon:

Welcome to Mastodon by @Gargron

Bye, Twitter. All the cool kids are migrating to Mastodon by Mashable

Rules

No illegal content. The server is hosted in France : racism, apology for terrorism, bullying, defamation, violations privacy rights and child pornograhy are illegal under French law.

No oppressive content (sexism, homophobia, etc).

No parody account.

No bot (for the moment).

Any graphical content have to contain a Content Warning.

No explicit sexual content in the public timeline without content warning (you can configure your toot privacy on "public but do not display on public timeline").

Mobile applications

Android : Tusky

iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon

Full list

Support Mastodon

The code source can be found here : Github

You can help the developer of Mastodon on Patreon

Support this instance mastodon.elmit.com
